description: This file defines the RoleNotifier class, which extends ChangeNotifier to manage and notify about role changes in a Flutter app. It interacts with an AuthService to subscribe to role stream updates and provides getters and methods to modify and access the role.

classes.name: RoleNotifier
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages user role state and listens to role updates from AuthService.

methods.name: RoleNotifier
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the RoleNotifier, sets the initial role, and subscribes to role stream updates.

methods.name: role
methods.description: Getter that returns the current role.

methods.name: setRole
methods.description: Method to update the role via AuthService.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up the stream subscription when the notifier is disposed.
